attributes.action: stop controlling what we can eat, drink, drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Enough is enough. First the smoking ban, rumours of alcohol prohibition, hysteria against private cars in general and 4x4s in particular, ongoing hype about climate change. Today I see that not even eggs can be advertised.
What is this country coming to? 
Let people decide for themselves.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
